SEARCH
Package com.vv.recipe.vv.service

Class RecipeService

java.lang.Object
com.vv.recipe.vv.service.RecipeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class RecipeService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
RecipeService is the service class that implements UserDetailsService interface and provides functionalities for saving, finding and deleting recipes and registrations.
Since:
2023-02-04

    • find

      public VVRecipe find(Integer id)
      Finds the recipe with the given id from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the recipe to be found.
      Returns:
      The found recipe or null if not found.

    • findAll

      public List<VVRecipe> findAll()
      Finds all the recipes from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all the recipes.

    • search

      public List<VVRecipe> search(String name, String category)
      Searches the recipes based on the given name or category.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe.
      category - The category of the recipe.
      Returns:
      A list of matching recipes.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if both name and category are blank or both are not blank.

    • alreadyExists

      public boolean alreadyExists(String email)
      Checks if a registration with the given email already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the registration.
      Returns:
      True if a registration with the given email already exists, false otherwise.

    • loadUserByUsername

      public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String username) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Loads the user details for the given username (email).
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      username - The email of the user.
      Returns:
      The UserDetails object for the given username.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user with the given username is not found.
